text: mariyu visvasulaina purusulu mariyu visvasulaina strilu okarikokaru snehitulu. Varu dharmanni adesistaru (bodhistaru) mariyu adharmam nundi nisedhistaru (varistaru) mariyu namaj nu sthapistaru mariyu vidhidanam (jakat) cellistaru mariyu allah ku mariyu ayana pravaktaku vidheyulai untaru. Ilanti varine allah karunistadu. Niscayanga, allah sarva saktimantudu, maha vivecana parudu
